entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 1:16 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: ENE 29 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets overnight. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
